description.narrative: UNICEF, government and partners have strengthened capacity to generate, analyze and use rigorous evidence from equity-focused research and evaluation, for evidence-based policy advocacy and programming, which contributes to Evaluation And Research. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Child rights and gender equality prioritized in evidence-based public discourse, national policies, budget allocations, legislation, and social protection systems and progressively promoted and protected in social and cultural attitudes, practices and norms, with a focus on the most vulnerable

participating-org.narrative: CENTER FOR EVALUATION AND DEVELOPMENT C4ED
THE OXFORD POVERTY AND HUMAN DEVELO OPHI

sector.narrative: Building evaluation capacity in UNICEF and the UN system
Evaluation innovation learning, uptake and partnerships for evaluation

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: UNICEF, government and partners have strengthened capacity to generate, analyze and use rigorous evidence from equity-focused research and evaluation, for evidence-based policy advocacy and programming

description.narrative: Despite the challenges posed by COVID-19 and limited access to the field, planned evaluations and studies have managed to proceed in the first half of 2020, including a rapid assessment of socio-economic impact of COVID-19. Remote data collection approaches were adopted to address the challenges of lack of field access. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:29/07/2020

title.narrative: Number of completed evaluations, in accordance with the IMERP and rated at least "satisfactory" by GEROS.
Percentage of EMR actions that have been implemented (underway + completed) in a year
